title: Use prod cert root instead of local by default
summary: [Problem] The client currently uses a local certificate root by default instead of the production one. [Symptoms] Misconfiguration risk and potential security mismatch. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Security / Privacy. [Problem Type] Configuration Issue.

title: Add support for multiple signatures in the collection metadata
summary: [Problem] Collection metadata lacks support for multiple signatures. [Symptoms] Unable to handle multiple signature validation cases. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Functionality. [Problem Type] Functionality Error.
symptoms: Collection metadata cannot store multiple signatures

title: Consider caching the JEXL result per JEXL expression in the default RemoteSettings filter
summary: [Problem] JEXL results are recalculated repeatedly in the default RemoteSettings filter. [Symptoms] Inefficient evaluation of repeated expressions. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Performance. [Problem Type] Performance Issue.

title: Only ignore older server changeset if local signature is valid
summary: [Problem] The client ignores older server changesets regardless of local signature validity. [Symptoms] Possible data inconsistency during synchronization. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Account / Sync. [Problem Type] Functionality Error.

title: Be more precise about JEXL filtering in client logs
summary: [Problem] Client logs provide imprecise information about JEXL filtering. [Symptoms] Limited debugging clarity in logs. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Other. [Problem Type] Functionality Error.

title: Data synchronization should never go back in time
summary: [Problem] Synchronization may regress to previous data states. [Symptoms] Synced data reverts to older versions. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Account / Sync. [Problem Type] Functionality Error.

title: Remote settings client should let glean handle telemetry sampling
summary: [Problem] Telemetry sampling is handled by the Remote Settings client instead of Glean. [Symptoms] Inconsistent telemetry sampling behavior. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Other. [Problem Type] Configuration Issue.
symptoms: Telemetry sampling not delegated to Glean

title: Lots of EmptyDatabaseError:  "main/nimbus-desktop-experiments"  has not been synced yet when running mochitest-browser
summary: [Problem] EmptyDatabaseError occurs for 'main/nimbus-desktop-experiments' during mochitest-browser. [Symptoms] Test execution fails due to unsynced database. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Account / Sync. [Problem Type] Crash.

title: Improve RemoteSettingsClient.db/.attachments lazy handling to work better with TypeScript
summary: [Problem] Lazy handling of database and attachments is not optimized for TypeScript. [Symptoms] Integration or typing issues when using TypeScript. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Other. [Problem Type] Functionality Error.

title: Consider having a queue for Remote Settings network requests
summary: [Problem] Remote Settings handles multiple network requests without a queue. [Symptoms] Potential race conditions or request overload. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Network / Connection. [Problem Type] Functionality Error.

title: Gecko Remote-Settings client is caching attachments that consuming code is also caching
summary: [Problem] Both the client and consuming code cache attachments redundantly. [Symptoms] Duplicate caching increases memory usage. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Performance. [Problem Type] Performance Issue.

title: Add `step` field to client Telemetry and send telemetry before starting downloads
summary: [Problem] Telemetry lacks a 'step' field and is sent too late. [Symptoms] Missing or delayed telemetry data before downloads. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Other. [Problem Type] Functionality Error.

title: Remote settings client appears to be returning empty responses when loading experiments collection immediately after startup
summary: [Problem] Remote settings client returns empty responses at startup. [Symptoms] Experiments collection fails to load initially. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Account / Sync. [Problem Type] Functionality Error.

title: Intermittent TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | remotereftests.py | Timed out while waiting for server startup.
summary: [Problem] Tests intermittently fail due to timeout while waiting for server startup. [Symptoms] TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL errors during remotereftests.py execution. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Network / Connection. [Problem Type] Crash.

title: Fix some jsdoc issues in RemoteSettingsClient.sys.mjs / Attachments.sys.mjs
summary: [Problem] jsdoc comments contain issues in RemoteSettingsClient.sys.mjs and Attachments.sys.mjs. [Symptoms] Documentation inconsistency or missing type hints. [Environment] Firefox. [Possible Category] Other. [Problem Type] Other.
